name: Pico PONG!
description:
A old school pong game with the Pico-8 Style.
My first "game" uploaded to itch.io
You can find the original here:

For the game itself there is not much to say other than "its pong guys!"
I made this in a hour or two and was just me experimenting with what scratch can do.
Yes, it is a scratch game with a Pico-8 Style and font.

But with that Enjoy!
